snippet: Patti Davis, the daughter of former President Ronald Reagan, said that she believes he would have bucked the Republican Party on the issue.
abstract: Patti Davis, daughter of former President Ronald Reagan, says she believes he would have bucked the Republican Party on the same-sex marriage issue and supported it.
lead_paragraph: Patti Davis, the daughter of former President Ronald Reagan, said that she believes he would have bucked the Republican Party on the issue.

headline.seo: Reagan Daughter Says He’d Have Backed Gay Marriage
headline.main: Reagan’s Daughter Says He’d Have Backed Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Daughter Speculates on Reagan’s Gay-Rights Views

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
